case.state: Hi, I'm Leonie Pinelli - Captain Jeralt's first and greatest apprentice! Is a hot spring really the best place for a game of 'poker'?
Hi, I'm Leonie Pinelli - Captain Jeralt's first and greatest apprentice! Is a library really the best place for a game of strip poker?
Hi, I'm Leonie Pinelli - Captain Jeralt's first and greatest apprentice! I heard there was a game of poker?
Well, fancy seeing you guys here.
Hey, is this some kind of secret academy club meeting?
Are we... going to talk about this back at Garreg Mach?
Wait, Bernadetta? Is that you? You look... more mature. Like you've seen hell.
(That looks like Bernadetta, but older? Maybe it's someone else from house Varley?)
(That looks like Bernadetta, but older? Is it an older sister - or her mother?)
Bernadetta? What are you doing here? Aren't you usually stuck in your room?
Bernadetta? What a surprise seeing you here!
(Is that Bernadetta? What's she doing here?)
Professor? Oh, sorry, when I heard you were called ~human~, thought you were someone else.
Oh, you aren't... nice to meet you, ~human~. I thought you were my Professor for a second.
(Some of the people here look... familiar, but not? Like they're from another time?)
(Some of the people here look oddly familiar, but... are they even from FÃ³dlan?)
What's "Stone Free"? I don't see anything. Am I supposed to?
I don't see anything, Jolyne. Am I supposed to?
"Monika"? Oh, never mind, you aren't- forget it, let's play.
(For a second, I thought she was going to be a different Monika.)
Is that a talking butterfly? (It better keep its distance.)
Of all the things to play cards against... I wasn't expecting that.
Great! Let's get this game started!
Even I need a break from training now and again. This seems like a good way to unwind, right?
I haven't had a lot of chances to play cards, but I think I've got the hang of it.
It's a shame this isn't a real game of poker. If I won big, I could repay my village...
I can work with the cards I have.
I'll stick with this hand.
I'm fine with these cards.
You know what? I'm not swapping.
Ugh! This hand is doing nothing for me. Give me ~cards~.
This hand makes my skin crawl. Give me ~cards~.
Give me ~cards~.
I'll take ~cards~.
I can do this - give me ~cards~.
Gambit time. Swapping ~cards~.
To start with, I'll swap ~cards~.
Dealer! Give me ~cards~.
It all comes down to this. Give me ~cards~.
Dealer, give me ~cards~. I'm counting on you.
I'll keep it simple! ~Cards~!
I've got another option. Swapping ~cards~.
Time to turn the tables - swapping ~cards~!
One wrong move and I'm finished... swapping ~cards~.
Dealer, give me ~cards~.
Give me ~cards~.
I'll keep it simple and swap ~cards~.
I'll swap out ~cards~.
Finally, my gambit paid off! My losing streak ends now.
Finally!
Pure grit!
That's the spirit!
(Woah... no way! There's no way I got this lucky!)
(Hah! There's no way I can lose with a hand like this!)
Ouch! That's not good...
Ugh... I'll manage!
(Woah... no way! There's no way I got this lucky!)
(Hah! There's no way I can lose with a hand like this!)
Okay, this hand is... It's a Killing Edge in card form!
I'll... manage.
Ouch! That's not good...
(Nice, my hard work finally paid off with this hand. )
(Wow! My good luck charm really paid off with this hand!)
Alright, I've been thinking, and I've settled on my mercenary title. Ready? ... The Blade Breaker II. What do you all think?

state.text: I want to be a top-tier mercenary, like Captain Jeralt the Blade Breaker. For my title, I was thinking... The Raging Bear. Well?

case.state: If I want to be as good as the Blade Breaker, I need my own tough-sounding title. I was thinking... The Executioner. Well?
Let me ask you all something. What do you think makes a great mercenary?
Sweet! I mean... it's a decent start.
Not bad, not bad.
Alright, play it cool...
Let's put it to the test.
Alright, this'll do just fine.
Let's see this hand in action.
I can work with these.
This hand isn't too bad.
This round could probably go either way.
This might all come down to luck.
Come on, give me a lucky break here.
Well- I'll manage, at least.
Let's see, if it goes like this... it should be okay.
This hand isn't too bad, but I'll need something better to stay in.
Well, damn. I guess my good luck charm finally wore off.
Damn! I really thought I could hang in there, but I guess my luck ran out.
Damn, I got cocky. This probably won't go well.
Ouch! That's not good...
What?! What even are these cards?
Oh, come on!
What the heck is with these cards?
Ugh... I'll manage!
(This is bad...)
Oh, come on! I need better luck than this to stay in...
(This is bad, real bad.)
One bad round, and I'm finished.
Let's see this hand in action.
Well, my school is a little different from yours. I'm training to be a warrior, and I'll probably get roped into working for the Leicester Alliance - but I really want to be a freelancer.
Oh, I'm not really big on romance and dating. Pass?
People always talk about romance, but, honestly, I'm not interested in that kind of stuff.
That's the same for me, actually! I'm going to ask my Professor if I can switch my study focus to horseback and bows.
A race? You're on. I'll have you know I'm one of the fastest students in Golden Deer!
A race? You're on. I'll have you know I was one of the fastest students in Golden Deer!
That's a deep question, Yuelia. I would go with what my gut tells me.
I'm going to be a renowned mercenary, just like Captain Jeralt! I just need to think of a title for myself...
I'll be known all across FÃ³dlan as a great warrior, a mercenary like the Blade Breaker himself!
Most of my reading is to do with my training. Usually tips on using a bow, or riding on horseback. Or both.
Most of the things I read are for my classes. I haven't read a novel in a while.
Shamir, are you still going to be running that bow seminar later?
Shamir, are you still running the seminar on bows and lances later?
What, a pirate with two peg legs? Wouldn't that make it hard to stand up?
You know, that actually sounds... interesting, Aella. Not that I'd actually do it!
You aren't the only one that's thought about that, Aella. I-I mean, I would probably never do it.
I've always been partial to a good Vegetable Stir-Fry. Just, not when Flayn is the one cooking - that girl nearly set the kitchen on fire using veggies.
I love a good King of Beasts Steak. You need to kill a Duscur bear to get it, which is a big task, but the end result is delicious!

condition.saying: The Joestar spirit will get me through this!

case.state: What is that, a star tattoo? I guess it suits you!
Is that a star tattoo? Wait, no, is that a birthmark? I didn't know you could get birthmarks like that.
That's incredibly disrespectful, to put yourself on the same level as the goddess.
A goddess? You? Yeah right.
Hey, no need to run your mouth and pretend to be a goddess. That's disrespectful.
I don't get a lot of time to play sports, but I'm a pretty good runner. Although, I guess you could count 'sparring' as a sport.
Oh, I... I hardly ever spend time naked. I like having the feeling of wearing something, even if it's just my underwear.
You can only cast explosion? But surely if you're versed in Reason you can at least cast Fire as well?
You can only cast an explosion spell? Surely you can cast something else, like Fire, at the very least?
So you're an actual ghost, Polly? A ghost that parties? ... You're not just pulling my leg, are you?
So, Polly, you... you're a ghost? A party ghost? This is just some kind of magic trick, isn't it?
So you're an actual ghost, Spooky? A ghost that runs a haunted mansion? ... You're just pulling my leg, aren't you?
(Sounds like Bernadetta.) I would check on them now and again, but leave them be for the most part.
A giant frog? How big are we talking? Ten feet tall?
I've fought some giant beasts in my time, but I don't think I've ever heard of a giant frog...
I've fought some giant animals in my time, but I don't think I've ever seen a giant frog...
Me and my friends have to fight demonic beasts on a regular basis. We've gotten pretty good at coordinating our attacks to break through its armor.
My class and I have to fight giant beasts - bigger than a house! I'll have to keep score of how many giant birds we fight, since we always seem to run into them...
"France"? I've never even heard of a place called France.
"France" doesn't happen to be anywhere near FÃ³dlan, does it?
I enjoy spending time in nature - but, probably for different reasons than you do...
Right... Okay. So, my question is: What are duel monsters?
A net? For cabbage? What are you talking about, Megumin?
A net for cabbage? Is that some local slang from your village, Megumin?
You know, ~bernie_tgt~, we're in the same school but we don't hang out that much. How are you?
Say, ~bernie_tgt~? We should hang out more. How have you been?
You know Shamir, it feels a bit weird playing alongside one of my instructors.
You know Shamir, you're not a teacher, but you're still one of my instructors. Isn't this a bit weird?
So ~human~, you have white hair? Do you have a Crest or two, by any chance?
Hey ~human~, your hair is a pretty interesting color. Have you always had white hair?
So ~human~, who did you come here to meet? Girls? Or guys?
So ~human~, who did you come here to look at? Girls? Or guys?
Don't things seem a little bit unbalanced tonight? Us girls vs ~human~, the only boy here.
So what is this, a girl's night out?
Is this the sort of thing you girls usually get up to?
So, this is a women's night out, right?
I didn't accidentally get invited to a men-only table, did I?
So, did I get invited to the wrong table? Why am I the only woman here?
Hey ~fighter_target~, I know you're good at sewing, but how would you handle... fighting in close quarters?
Hey ~fighter_target~, I know you're good with a bow, but how would you handle a melee scrap?
(While I'm here, maybe I should ask ~fighter_target~ for combat advice?)
(Huh, maybe I should ask ~fighter_target~ for some combat tips? While I still have the chance.)
Hey ~fighter_target~, you look like you're good in a fight. Any tips for fighting up close?
Hey ~fighter_target~, you get into fights, right? Got any tips for close range?
Have you ever tried Four Spice Blend tea? It's my favorite - one of them, at least.
Have you ever tried Angelica tea? It's my favorite - one of them, at least.
Draw a painting, ~rivalry_target~, it'll last longer.
What are you staring at, ~rivalry_target~?
What's wrong, ~rivalry_target~? Scared you might lose this round?
I guess I could- no, I'd rather lose than take off the necklace.
This necklace is too special to me. I'll just... take off my bra.
Captain Jeralt made this necklace for me a long time ago. It's a reminder of where I came from. So I'm keeping it on.
This necklace is a reminder of where I came from - Captain Jeralt made it. I'll keep it on.
Let's not mention this back at the Officer's Academy, alright?
We aren't going to talk about this back at school, are we?
Let's not mention this back at Garreg Mach, alright?
We aren't going to talk about this back home, are we?
Well, I guess it had to be me.
I guess this will even things out, at least.
I didn't come here to lose, but I guess winning won't be a breeze either.
Looks like it's my turn again.
Looks like I didn't keep the lead for long.
Darn it. Wish I could have kept my actual clothes on for a bit longer.
Hells - looks like it's my turn again.
After this I won't be taking any more off, I swear.
I'll get through this - I'm quite stubborn.
Damn, I thought I could get away without taking off my shirt.
Dang, Almost got away with it.
If it had to be anyone, I guess I just drew the short straw.
Don't get comfortable - I didn't come here to lose!
This is only a small setback - I'll do better next round.
My turn again? Already?
Darn it, it'll be hard to get the lead back now.
Well, I'm running out of small things to get rid of.
Hells - my turn again? Really?
Dealer, are you rigging things against me?
Oh for- no, it's fine, I'll do it.
Oh, come on! Me, really? Again?
Dastards... Fine, I'll do it.
Very funny. You'll be sorry in a minute.
You just want to see a fit girl in the buff, don't you, ~human~?
It just had to be me, didn't it?
Beginner's lack-of-luck, I guess.
Don't get cocky, I'll come back from this.
Really? My turn again?
I must've put on my lucky necklace on wrong, because this isn't right.
Well, looks like I'm still leading - in last place.
Of all the people here, it had to be me again?
This just isn't my night.
You've got to be kidding.
Do I really have to go topless... out here? In the street?
Do I really need to go topless out here? Fine.
Do I really have to go topless... out here? In an alley?
Do I really need to go topless out here? Fine.
Normally I'd be changing into my armor in a room like this...
I wouldn't mind getting changed in a place like this, but stripping down...
I guess I'll get rid of my jacket, just to start with.
Don't worry, I'm just starting with my jacket.
Don't get too excited. It's just my jacket.
It's just my jacket for now. And I wasn't even wearing it on my shoulders!
Do you mind if I take my socks off at the same time?
My socks are caught in my boots - well, off they go as well.
There go my boots. Oh, and my socks for good measure.
Well, time to go topless.
Guess it's time to show you my abs.
I guess I have no choice, so...
First the jacket, now the gloves.
These gloves have served me well. Goodbye, gloves.
Well, there goes my dress, too.
And here goes... the dress part of my uniform.
I probably should've kept my socks on last round...
I don't wear much armor, because I'm better at avoiding hits, but I couldn't dodge this one.
Well, there goes my skirt, too.
First my shirt, now my bra? Fine, if you really want to see them.
All I can ask is... try not to stare.
All eyes on me now? You don't have to stare at me...
Have you been waiting for this, or what?
Alright, here I go. I'm... not ashamed of my own body.
I'm not ashamed of what I have. Take a good look... I mean, if you want.
I'm not going to back down just because you boys are starting at me.
I'm not going to lose like this, just so you guys know.

state.text: Captain Jeralt said to never back down. So I won't. You boys won't have it easy.

case.state: Hey, I'm not giving up just because some boys are staring at me.
Oh! Well... uh, thank you, Yusuke, that's very kind of you.
Well... thank you, Yusuke. I wasn't expecting to be flattered.
Alright you two, whatever happens now, keep it to yourselves.
In class, they make us wear that dress really tight. I much prefer the sports gear, it's all loose.
That dress gets so stiff when we have to sit in lecture halls all day.
Oh yeah, it's definitely easier to move around without my dress on.
Huh? ~name~, why are you glaring at me?
Well, h-here they are.
What do you think? I think I look good.
You could already see my abs. Now you can enjoy my... my breasts as well.
Here they are. Do you... like what you see, ~player~?
Hey, is there a chair I can throw this over?
I like this jacket, but I never wear it. Is that weird?
My jacket makes a great belt.
I like this jacket, but I hardly ever wear it. Is that weird?
Actually... maybe I should have kept the socks on.
On second thought, maybe that wasn't such a good idea...
This feels liberating, in a way.
I can't believe you got me naked... I came here to win, not lose!
I should have expected this, but still...
Enjoying the view from over there?
Getting a good look at my abs from over there?
What are you staring at me for? I've been doing all my training.
It's not like I'm powerless without my gloves, you know.
Not like I'm going to need to pull any bowstrings here.
I'm out out the game, and you still haven't shown us your dick? Come on!
Damn, I'm out of the run, and you're still in the game?
You should keep those lewd comments to yourself, ~name~, before someone shuts you up.
You should hold your tongue, ~name~, before someone takes a swipe at it.
You should probably cool it with the lecherous comments, ~name~.
Looks like you're up, ~name~.
You're up, ~name~. What'll it be?
Time to strip, ~name~.
Come on, ~name~, don't be shy.
This is my favorite part. Go on, ~name~.
Don't be a coward now, ~name~.
Show us something good, ~name~!
Nice! Take it off, ~name~!
You've still got things to lose after all this time?
I'm already spent and you're still in?
(That felt like a good workout. I wish I wasn't already out, though.)
(So I just have to stand here and watch ~name~ strip?)
(So I get to watch ~name~ strip? Doesn't feel as exciting now.)
Uh, where exactly are you aiming that thing, Aimee?
Are you going to transform again, Akko?
Going to use your magic again, Akko?
Well Akko, going to use your magic to hide when you strip?
You came well protected, ~name~. Who made that armor?
Hey, ~name~, who made your armor? Are they taking commissions?
Those horns you have, ~name~, they remind me of someone...
I'm out out the game, and you still haven't shown off down there? Come on!
Damn, I'm out of the run, and you're still in the game?
You should probably cool it with the lecherous comments, ~name~.
You should hold your tongue, ~name~, before someone takes a swipe at it.
Your turn, ~name~. Don't be shy.
Looks like it's your turn, ~name~.
What will it be, ~name~?
Alright, it's your time to strip, ~name~.
Don't worry, ~name~, I won't judge.
Alright ~name~, show us what you've been holding back.
Don't chicken out of it now, ~name~!
Show us something good, ~name~!
Nice! Take it off, ~name~!
Show us what you've been hiding, ~name~.
Let's keep it going, ~name~. We're not going to wait forever.
I'm already spent and you're still in?
(That felt like a good workout. I wish I wasn't already out, though.)
(Even some of the girls here are pretty... cute?)
(So I just have to stand here and watch ~name~ strip?)
I'm spent... you're still going? Was I that outmatched?
A tie? What happens now, do we just skip?
A tie? What happens now, do we all lose?
WOAH! Be careful with... that thing!
GAH! Be careful with... whatever that is!
(Is that some kind of ballista-)WOAH!
What the heck is a "duel disk"? At first it looked like some kind of weird gauntlet, but the fact that it looks so... flimsy says otherwise.
So what is that "duel disk" used for? Just looking at it, it seems less like a weapon, and more like... some kind of toy?
You know, it's not very becoming of a noble to brag so much.
You waited this long to remove your ~clothing~? Smart move.
You really waited this long to remove your ~clothing~? But does that mean you can't see now?
Wait, you're taking off your ~clothing~? Will you be able to see without them?
Taking off your ~clothing~? How bad's your vision without them?
Oh come on! Show me more than that, ~name~.
Taking off something small, ~name~?
You won't need your ~clothing~ any more.
Clever move, only taking off your ~clothing~.
Well, it's a start.
You're only taking off your ~clothing~?
Count your victories while you can, ~name~.
*Sigh.* Is it wrong that I'm a little bit mad right now?
Is it bad that I'm actually a bit mad at you, ~name~?
You think that's funny, don't you, ~name~?
Maybe I underestimated you, ~name~,
You're not allowed to look at me until you take off something more than that.
You dastard, that's unfair.
Now that's unfair, ~name~.
You're just playing dirty.
You're still taking off small items at this point?
At this point, I should probably be mad that you can take off ~clothing~.
You could've at least taken your ~clothing~ off sooner, as a courtesy...
And now you're showing us... a bit of paper? Is it part of the toy?
Okay, yeah, that's definitely some kind of game piece.
Alright, everyone gang up on ~name~! I'm kidding.
We're just getting started here.
Let's get to it. Moving on?
Well, let's move on.
Bring on the next challenge.
That's really it, then? Nothing else?
Any other accessories to take off, first?
Are you sure that really counts?
Don't let your pride get away from you, ~name~.
Count your blessings while you can, ~name~.
You're not... making this easy.
Take off something better next time, ~name~.
At least he can only take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ off once, right?
Next time, take off something that actually matters!
If you're going to play that way, I might not come back.
If you're going to be that way, ~name~, I might not come back to play against you.
Oh thank the goddess, it wasn't a talking butterfly after all... that's much less creepy.
Thank the goddess, you're not really a talking butterfly... now I'm way less creeped out.
Oh come on! Show us more than that, ~name~.
Going to take off something small, ~name~?
Taking off your ~clothing~ is just a good idea right now.
Clever move, ~name~.
You're only taking off your ~clothing~?
Better you than me, right ~name~?
Oh yeah, you held on to your ~clothing~ until now.
You won't need your ~clothing~ any more.
I'm not really mad at you, ~name~, that's pretty smart.
Oh, you think that's cute, ~name~?
Maybe I shouldn't have underestimated ~name~.
Finally ditching your ~clothing~?
Maybe I... should've taken my socks off separately.
You can do more than that, ~name~.
Come on, ~name~, don't be like that!
Oh, that's not funny, ~name~.
~name~, you're killing me here.
Okay then, Yuelia. Nice to see the real you.
Alright then, it's nice to meet you properly, Yuelia.
Well, that's certainly... creative, Megumin.
You certainly have an active imagination, Megumin.
Wait, you aren't going to blow something up if you lose, are you?
Wait, Megumin, you aren't going to blow something up if you start losing, are you?
Keep it up, ~name~.
Keep it up, ~name~ - while you can.
Alright, are we moving on?
We're just getting started.
Bring on the next challenge.
Well, let's keep going.
There you go. Now, let's keep going, shall we?
There you go! Let's keep going.
Got any more clothing like that?
(I need to think of a plan if I want to stay in...)
Let's see how well you do next round.
Just your ~clothing~? Fine then.
(If I'm not careful, they might beat me here.)
(She's crafty, I'd better keep my wits about me.)
At least she can only take ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ off once, right?
Next time, take off something that actually matters!
I should've taken you more seriously from the start.
It wouldn't bother me if you took off something... more.
You're being a real dick, ~name~.
~clothing~? Really?! Dammit, ~name~.
Oh come on, ~name~, give me something to work with!
Wait, you're taking off your ~clothing~? But you already... never mind.
Your ~clothing~, huh? We're finally getting somewhere good.
Your ~clothing~, huh? Nice.
Your ~clothing~ doesn't really hide anything, does it?
Your ~clothing~ doesn't actually hide anything, does it?
You aren't just stalling for time, are you, ~name~?
You can't stay hidden forever, ~name~.
No chance I can persuade you to go further than that, ~name~?
You need to stop stalling like this, ~name~.
Just your ~clothing~? Surely you can be more adventurous than that.
You're trying to outlast me, but I'll wear you down, ~name~.
Your ~clothing~ hides less than my dress did!
Any chance you could be more daring than that, ~name~?
~clothing~? Is that it? Nothing else?
(Damn you, ~name~!) Is that it? Come on!
(Damn you, ~name~, give me something to work with!)
I'm done, and you're still taking off ~clothing~...
Next time, you'll take off your ~clothing~ sooner, I swear.
Next game, I'll surpass you, ~name~. You'll strip your ~clothing~ off sooner.
Well, we're finally getting somewhere.
We're finally getting somewhere with you, ~name~.
(I wonder how often he washes his ~clothing~?)
(I wonder if Jeralt ever wore ~clothing~ like that?)
Let's move on to the next one.
First your ~clothing~, then the rest.
Aww. Well, next time then.
We'll see how long you can last, ~name~.
I can wait, ~name~.
(I know how to be patient. I'll see ~name~ naked yet!)
Next round, swallow your pride and take off something good.
You'll lose soon, ~name~. Watch out.
(I hope ~name~ shows us what he's hiding next time...)
You'd better... do more next time.
Show us more of that, next round.
Be a bit more daring next round, okay?
Give me something more next round, okay?
(I was completely outmatched this game...)
(You'll get 'em next time, Leonie!)
Well, your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(have done their|has done its)~ job.
(How do I want to play this going forward?)
There you go. Much better with your ~clothing~ off.
Aah! I hate bugs! If only I had my bow with me, I'd shoot it!
Gah! I can't stand bugs! Someone kill it, before I do!
Taking off your ~clothing~? That'll get the boys excited, I'm sure.
Well, we're finally getting somewhere.
Hey, where did you get your ~clothing~ from, ~name~?
(I wonder how often she washes her ~clothing~?)
(I wonder if I could pull off ~clothing~ like that?)
Your ~clothing~, huh? No need to be modest.
Your ~clothing~, huh? That'll do for now.
Your ~clothing~ doesn't really get you excited, does it?
Your ~clothing~ doesn't actually conceal anything, really.
You're really stalling for time like this, ~name~?
What secrets are you trying to hide, ~name~?
Any chance I could get you to be bolder, ~name~?
Just your ~clothing~? Surely you can be more heroic than that.
You're trying to outlast me, but I'll wear you down, ~name~.
Your ~clothing~ hides less than my dress did...
Taking off your ~clothing~? I'll take that victory.
Any chance you could be more daring than that, ~name~?
~clothing~? Is that it? Nothing else?
(Damn you, ~name~!) Is that it? Come on!
(Damn you, ~name~, give me something to work with!)
I'm done, and you're still taking off ~clothing~...
Next time, you'll take off your ~clothing~ sooner, I swear.
Next game, I'll beat you, ~name~. You'll strip your ~clothing~ off sooner.
~Name~, you've got a nice butt. Just thought I'd be forward about it.
Let's move on to the next one.
First your ~clothing~, then the rest.
Well, maybe next time.
Well, there's always next round.
We'll see how this goes, anyway.
Next round, do us a favor and take off something better.
You'll lose soon, ~name~. Watch out.
(I hope ~name~ shows us what she's hiding next time...)
How about... showing more skin next time?
Show us more of that, next round.
Be a bit more daring next round, okay?
Not bad, but... any chance you could do more?
(I was completely outmatched this game...)
(You'll get 'em next time, Leonie!)
(I can't let my guard down next time. Not even against girls.)
Well, your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(have done their|has done its)~ job.
(How do I want to play this going forward?)
There you go. Much better with your ~clothing~ off.
Taking your ~clothing~ off already?
He's taking off his ~clothing~? This should be good.
Taking off your ~clothing~? Nothing else to take off first?
Looks like you're running out of options, ~name~.
(This is getting my blood pumping, seeing ~name~ get almost-naked...)
Oh yeah, that's more like it!
About time you took off your ~clothing~...
No need to be shy around me. I'm already done.

Oh yeah, that's more like it!
About time you took off your ~clothing~...

Maybe you can give me pointers next time, ~name~?

Not bad, but the game's still going.

Not bad, but you'll run out of clothes sooner or later.

Well, we know you keep active, ~name~.
It's easy to tell that you train, at least a little bit, right ~name~?
Wow, you must train really hard, ~name~.
If you ever need a training buddy, just let me know, ~name~.
(He's even more muscular than Raphael!)
You've got a pretty lean build, ~name~. Reminds me of Ignatz...

Don't take this the wrong way, ~name~, but do you want some work-out tips?
You know, ~name~, with a bit of work, you could get into shape in no time.
Not bad. I promise not to stare.
You look pretty good from where I'm standing, ~name~.
You're going to show us your... thing, already? I haven't done anything!
Wow, I haven't even lost anything, and you're already getting naked?
You're going to show us your... thing, already? I've barely done anything!
Wow, I've barely done anything, and you're already getting naked?

Well ~name~, looks like it's time to show it all.
You've seen my whole body; it's time to pay up, ~name~.
Come on, ~name~. Don't let me down.
Well, you've seen my tits, so this is only fair.

Show us your dick already!
Wow, you're... are you a 'grower', ~name~?

Wow, that... that looks pretty good, ~name~.
Wow, I... you look pretty good, ~name~.

That's... are they usually that big? Is it always that big, ~name~?

Well, we know where this is headed. Show us what you've got, ~name~!
Well, we know where this is going. Show us what you've got, ~name~!

state.text: Well, we all come in different shapes and sizes.

case.state: No need to be worried, ~name~, your chest looks great!

Looking good, ~name~!

Woah... those are reminding me of Hilda, or even Manuela...

Glad you've finally decided to join me, ~name~.

Well now, I think you forgot something there, Bulma.

By the goddess, you did forget!
Wow, you did forget! Even after you wrote yourself a note...
Yeah, well, I don't have much of a choice here, Lyn.

I'm not going to stare, don't worry.
I'll look away if you want me to.
Well, the more the merrier at this point.
At this point, you would stand out more if you weren't completely naked!
~school_uniform_target~, is that a school uniform? Where are you a student of?

So do we just have to stand here while you take something off?
We don't have to do anything ourselves, right?
So while ~name~ removes their clothes we just stand here?
So it's only the loser that has to strip? Which means it's ~name~, right?

That's pretty unlucky, ~target~. You didn't make someone mad, did you?
Wow, I can't believe I'm not 'it'. The odds were against me there.
Wow, that card really came in clutch. I barely got by.
Is that really a necessary use of magic?
Is that really the best way to use magic?
Well, I'll be a great mercenary one day. I'll work for money, but what I really care about is helping those that can't protect themselves.
I'm aiming to be a mercenary, like my mentor Captain Jeralt, so part of that is getting paid.

I already knew the answer, don't worry.

Hey, ~name~, who made your armor? Are they taking commissions?
Hey ~name~, are you some kind of teacher? What is it that you teach?

Hey, house underwear are great! They're perfect for training, and still look decent.
The house underwear would make for some nice training clothes - but people get mad if I wear nothing but them...

I don't know what you're making a fuss about, Blake. Your ears look fine to me, even if they are cat ears.
Oh... cat ears? Is that a thing where you come from?
That's a pretty cute looking cape. A lot of mages I know like to wear them.
Looks like you're out! I told you I wouldn't go down easily.
So, it's come to this? Looks like I had nothing to worry about.
Putting on a show, just for me, ~name~?
Just you and me, ~name~. This is pretty exciting!
Wow, you must be terrible at this game, ~name~.

Wow, you're... going straight into it, aren't you?
Well, looks like you're out!

About time you joined me, ~name~. Put on a good show.
